name: Seahorse
description: Unique fish with a horse-like head and a tube-like body.

name: Fangtooth
description: Fangtooths are beryciform fish of the family Anoplogastridae that live in the deep sea.

name: Goldfish
description: A popular pet fish known for its bright color and easy care.

name: Clownfish
description: Famous for their vibrant orange and white stripes, often associated with anemones.

name: Atlantic salmon
description: A fish known for its delicious taste and health benefits, especially its omega-3 fatty acids.

name: Cod
description: A popular seafood choice, often used in fish and chips.

name: Tuna
description: Another popular seafood, often eaten as sushi or in canned form.

name: Bass
description: A general term for various fish species, often found in both freshwater and saltwater environments.

name: Catfish
description: Recognizable by their whiskers, these fish are common in both freshwater and saltwater environments.

name: Eel
description: Long, snake-like fish, often found in rivers and oceans.

name: Flying Fish
description: Unique fish that can leap out of the water and glide for short distances.

name: Barracuda
description: A predatory fish with sharp teeth, found in tropical waters.

name: Angelfish
description: Brightly colored tropical fish that are popular in aquariums.

name: Puffer fish
description: A fish that can inflate its body with water to appear larger.

name: Shark
description: A large, predatory fish with a skeleton made of cartilage.

name: Seahorse
description: Unique fish with a horse-like head and a tube-like body.

name: Whale Shark
description: The largest fish in the world, a filter feeder that eats plankton.
